content.title: Its a Start
content.creator:
Clinton Fowler
November 6, 2014
content.content:
Have my first couple of backers Thank you very much! I have been turning pens to get a jump on the work.Still need to start some of the cigar pens so I have some of those ready to be shipped. Uncle has generously offered his artistic talents to help with the business. He will be doing Drawings, paintings, logos etc.. I am flipping between turning pens, promoting on facebook and working on cadd to get all my drawings cleaned up and ready to be cut on CNC Router and Laser once this project gets funded. So I busy busy busy. Thank you again to all the backers past preset and future.
Only the beginning
